items.value: Oh no, looks like the school is having problems with electricity!
But don't worry about my TV, because it is battery powered
Due to an overabundance of grappling hooks and to increase productivity
I have given them away to everyone!
Uh oh! Somebody must've activated my newly experimental teleporter!
I think you should be ready, because there's gonna be some unexpected fun!
There are fires appearing everywhere in the school!
I recommend not getting any near them at all
